title: Number of cars on the road in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2000 to 2018
summary: Overall Number of cars in millions has increased over the Year.
Number of cars in millions is slightly increasing from 2001 to 2004, roughly constant from 2004 to 2012, roughly decreasing from 2012 to 2013, and finally slightly increasing from 2013 to 2016.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2001 and 2002.
Maximum Number of cars in millions, about 31.8 was reported at Year 2016
Minimum Number of cars in millions about 27.8 was reached at Year 2001
min_summary: In general Number of cars in millions has rose over the Year.
